alert.note: Alert for Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson County through 345 PM CDT... At 317 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gautier, or near Moss Point, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocean Springs, Moss Point, Escatawpa, Gautier, Hickory Hills, Helena and Gulf Park Estates. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 56 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
